## Class overview

NOTE: each module topic represents 1 contact hour

### Module 1: A formal decision making process (6 contact hours)

1. [Introduction to decision making](Module-01-01.html)  
2. [PrOACT process](Module-01-02.html)
3. [Making decisions: uncertainty, risk, and linked decisions](Module-01-03.html)
4. [Decision trees and decision making under uncertainty](Module-01-04.html)
5. [Being a decision maker](Module-01-05.html)
6. [Decision trees and decision models](Module-01-06.html)


### Module 2: Decision making in natural resources and conservation contexts (5 contact hours)

1. [Introduction to structured decision making in natural resources management](Module-01-06.html)
2. [History, rational, and applications of decision making in natural resources and conservation](Module-01-06.html)
3. [Types of decision making philosophies in natural resources](Module-01-06.html)
4. [Structuring and quantifying objectives](Module-01-06.html)
5. [Decision making and working with stakeholders](Module-01-06.html)

16. [Eliciting and quantifying expert judgment](Module-03-16.html)
